オプション1:
Star Man cautiously followed the voice.
Peering in its direction, he found a man with a trapezoid-shaped head lying down.
The man looked like he was on the verge of death. Star Man dragged his heavy body closer.

The man was covered in bruises and bleeding.
Both of his legs were about three times their normal size.
"My legs are broken... I fell from a high place... I was pushed..."
Even speaking seemed painful for him.

"I... I don’t have anything right now... sorry.
But I know where there’s an acorn tree. I can bring some.
Can you hold out for a few hours?"
"Hah... hah... before that... sorry... do you have any water?"
"There are coconut trees near the sea. Ugh... those can be used for both moisture and food..."
Star Man staggered out of the ruin.
